data:item.name: pca9957hn led driver with demo app
data:item.display_title: PCA9957HN led driver with demo app running on FRDM-MCXN947 and FRDM-MCXA153
data:item.overview: A graphical interface allows the user to easily explore the different functions of the driver to use the LED controller features for color mixing, blinking and dimming LEDs.
